items.label: Virgin Mary Myth and Future of Reproduction
Bread Therapy Changing Lives of Seniors
The Shiretoko Sightseeing Boat Sinking Incident
Hakkoda's Deadly Snow Defeats Japanese Army

comedy/christianity-john.title: John the Hype Man
comedy/christianity-john.description: 英 Alright, folks, let's talk about John the Baptist, the original spiritual hype man. This guy was Jesus' warm-up act, the opening band before the main event.

comedy/christianity-mary.title: Virgin Mary Myth and Future of Reproduction

comedy/christianity-saint-peter.title: Saint Peter Roast
comedy/christianity-saint-peter.description: 英 You know, the tale of Saint Peter is a damn comedy gold mine. This guy was Jesus' main man, part of the holy entourage. But during the big trial, Pete pulls a disappearing act not once, not twice, but three times! Jesus must've been like, "Seriously, bro? We break bread together and this is how you do me?"

comedy/cooking-bread.title: Bread Therapy Changing Lives of Seniors
comedy/cooking-bread.description: 英Welcome, folks! Today we've got a real treat - a guest who's mixing up research in a way that'll make you think twice about your kitchen.

comedy/cooking-curry.title: Futuristic Japanese Curry
comedy/cooking-curry.description: 英 Folks, we're diving into some mind-blowing future cooking today.

comedy/cooking-potato-memories.title: Potato Memories
comedy/cooking-potato-memories.description: 英 Alright, so your mom grew up on a potato farm in Idaho, huh? That's like the Siberia of the United States, am I right?

comedy/cooking-ramen.title: The Ramen Empire Strikes Back
comedy/cooking-ramen.description: 英 Before you go, one last question. What's the future of ramen? Are we talking flying noodles, teleporting broth?

comedy/cooking-sushi-nightmare.title: Sushi Nightmare
comedy/cooking-sushi-nightmare.description: 英 Alright, so picture this: I waddle into this sushi joint, right? It's like stepping into a morgue for fish. Neon signs flickering like dying heartbeats, chrome gleaming like freshly polished coffins - the whole morbid shebang.

comedy/cooking-yakiniku.title: The Great Yakiniku Revolution
comedy/cooking-yakiniku.description: 英So, we're talking about this plant-based revolution, right? People ditching steaks for salads. But here's what I'm wondering: what's gonna happen to traditional meat dishes like yakiniku in Japan?

comedy/historical-figures-franklin.title: Franklin's Crazy Genius
comedy/historical-figures-franklin.description: 英Ladies and gentlemen, let me tell you about this wild-eyed lunatic, this absolute madman, this…… founding father we call Ben Franklin.

comedy/incident-everest.title: Kuriki's Everest Challenge
comedy/incident-everest.description: 英 Let's talk about Takashi Kuriki - a guy who looked at Mount Everest and said, "You can take my fingers, but you can't take my dream!" Born in Hokkaido, he climbed the highest peaks on six continents. Just one shy of the seven summits club, and you know which one gave him trouble.

comedy/incident-hakkoda.title: Hakkoda's Deadly Snow Defeats Japanese Army
comedy/incident-hakkoda.description: 英 Welcome to the podcast, folks! Today, we've got an expert on military history joining us. They've got some wild stories about armies getting their asses kicked by Mother Nature. So, tell us about this crazy Japanese snow disaster.

comedy/incident-sewol.title: The Sewol Ferry Disaster
comedy/incident-sewol.description: 英 Folks, today we're diving into a maritime disaster that's more messed up than my first attempt at yoga. We've got a ship safety expert here to break it down.

comedy/incident-shiretoko.title: The Shiretoko Sightseeing Boat Sinking Incident
comedy/incident-shiretoko.description: 英 Alright, so let's talk about Hokkaido, Japan. You know, that place with the snow-capped mountains and pristine lakes? Well, apparently, it's also home to boats with a fucking death wish. Can you believe this shit?

comedy/planet-mars.title: Mars Colonization and Future Science
comedy/planet-mars.description: 英Tonight my guest is a true comedy legend who's gonna give us his uniquely insightful and biting perspective on some cutting-edge science. Please welcome the one and only Guest!

comedy/planet-mercury.title: Mercury's Solar Roast
comedy/planet-mercury.description: 英 Hey there, space cadets! Today we're going to Mercury, the planet that's basically one giant tanning bed on steroids. Let's welcome our guest!

comedy/planet-pluto.title: Pluto
comedy/planet-pluto.description: 英 So, I'm reading this article about Pluto, right?

greeting.title: Hello from Docusaurus
greeting.description: Create a doc page with rich content.

intro.title: 🎉 Welcome
intro.description: 🚀英語が苦手でも大丈夫！💥　コメディ宇和島で笑いながら英語マスター！✨

tutorial-basics/congratulations.title: Congratulations!
tutorial-basics/congratulations.description: You have just learned the basics of Docusaurus and made some changes to the initial template.

tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.title: Create a Blog Post
tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.description: Docusaurus creates a page for each blog post, but also a blog index page, a tag system, an RSS feed...

tutorial-basics/create-a-document.title: Create a Document
tutorial-basics/create-a-document.description: Documents are groups of pages connected through:

tutorial-basics/create-a-page.title: Create a Page
tutorial-basics/create-a-page.description: Add Markdown or React files to src/pages to create a standalone page:

tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.title: Deploy your site
tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

tutorial-basics/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
tutorial-basics/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.

tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.title: Manage Docs Versions
tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.description: Docusaurus can manage multiple versions of your docs.
